about.title: Ray Entreprises
about.description: Born in december 2019 in the city of maracay edo aragua, venezuela, the company of your dreams
about.subtitle: MISSION
about.pitch: Collaborate with multiple companies at a national and international level, for the growth and recognition of the same, under our services, generating sources of well-paid jobs in the digital era, and at turn support with staff trained in telemarketing for micro and macro companies worldwide.

services.title: Our services
services.description: We offer a wide variety of services for your company

vision.description: OUR VISION IS TO POSITION US IN 1ST PLACE IN THE RANKING OF ENTELEMARKETIG COMPANIES WORLDWIDE, CONTRIBUTING TO ACHIEVING ECONOMIC OBJECTIVES FOR OUR HUMAN CAPITAL, REGARDLESS OF RELIGION, RACE OR ORIGIN.
